entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
